results.name: wordpress-mysql/wordpress

error.Text: Service has not ready endpoints, pods: [Pod/wordpress-5975f754cc-sr7pr Pod/wordpress-5975f754cc-jmfr2], expected 2

results.details:
Error: The service lacks ready endpoints because the expected 2 pods are not ready.

Solution: 1. Check pod status with `kubectl get pods`. 2. Inspect pod logs using `kubectl logs <pod-name>`. 3. Verify readiness probes in pod spec. 4. Ensure pods are running and healthy. 5. Restart pods if necessary.

results.name: wordpress-mysql/wordpress-5975f754cc-sr7pr

error.Text: Readiness probe failed: HTTP probe failed with statuscode: 500

results.details:
Error: The readiness probe failed because the application returned a 500 status code, indicating an internal server error.

Solution: 
1. Check application logs for errors.
2. Ensure all dependencies are running.
3. Verify configuration settings.
4. Restart the application.
